sentences.en: Bovine trypanosomiasis spreads widely in Ethiopia , producing a serious menance to cattle.
sentences.cn: 牛锥虫病在埃塞俄比亚是一种流行广泛、危害严重的疾病.

sentences.en: Bovine viral diarrhea virus ( BVDV ) leads to BVD - MD , which prevails worldwide.
sentences.cn: 牛病毒性腹泻病毒 ( BVDV ) 引起牛病毒性腹泻 - 黏膜病, 广泛分布于世界各地.

sentences.en: Bubble change looks to know, but leather and bovine leather distinguished hard.
sentences.cn: 泡沫革一看便知, 但合成革与牛皮革就难以区分了.

sentences.en: He was a gentle, rather bovine man.
sentences.cn: 他是一位文雅而反应迟钝的人.

sentences.en: Hydrolyzed Collagen Protein derived from 100 % pure pharmaceutical food grade bovine collagen.
sentences.cn: 水解胶原蛋白来自100%纯医药食品级胶原.

sentences.en: I'm depressed by the bovine enthusiasm of the crowd's response.
sentences.cn: 人群毫无热情的迟钝反应使我感到很沮丧。

sentences.en: In cows, the official name of the disease is bovine spongiform encephalopathy.
sentences.cn: 就牛而言, 这种病的正式名称是牛海绵状脑病.

sentences.en: Only fragmentary information on pathogenesis of bovine malignant catarrhal fever is availible.
sentences.cn: 关于牛恶性卡他热的病理发生,仅能获得一些零星的资料.

sentences.en: Outside the bovine host, the organism can be readily cultured.
sentences.cn: 这种微生物在宿主牛体外, 容易被培养.

sentences.en: So maybe Silicon Valley will indeed get its bovine equivalent.
sentences.cn: 或许硅谷也确实得到了等同于牛城般的优势.

sentences.en: The bovine genome sequencing project found that cow genome contains 22,000 genes.
sentences.cn: 从牛类动物基因组一系列的调查发现奶牛基因组包含了22,000个基因.

sentences.en: The face of bovine section chief at a draught red after all!
sentences.cn: 牛科长的脸一下子红到底了!

sentences.en: The fetal bovine serum ( FBS ) has been widely used in biomedical research.
sentences.cn: 胎牛血清在生物医学研究中广泛应用.

sentences.en: The International Bovine Meat Agreement done at Marrakesh on 15 April 1994.
sentences.cn: 《国际牛肉协定》1994年4月15日订于马拉喀什.

sentences.en: Viral bovine rhinotracheitis simulates and may be combined with shipping fever.
sentences.cn: 牛病毒性鼻气管炎和运输热相似,并可能和运输热同时发生.

phrases.tran_cn: 牛血清白蛋白；牛血清清蛋白

trans.tran_cn: 牛的，关于牛的，迟钝的，笨拙的
